name: TVTropes 1.3 - Wide and Colorful
description: Some tweaks to v1.3 of TVTropes.org, launched in February 2016
additional_info:
For best results, turn on Wide Load then go to your profile at http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/profile.php and turn on Lefthand Sidebar. There's also a Greasemonkey version if you prefer. Features:
  • Changes the color scheme to replace some of the greys with blues, and adds shadows to make things pop
  • Shrinks the sidebar to a more managable size
  • Prevents the banners in Community Showcase from overflowing
  • The editor uses a monospace font once more
Changes in v2.5:
  • Grey background for editing and previewing pages.
  • History now uses a monospace font for code, and displays line breaks correctly.
Changes in v2.2:
  • Now works with subwikis (Darth, Sugar, YMMV, etc.)
  • Added shadows to things that were missing them
  • Reduced the font size for sidebar menu items by 2%
  • Footer is now blue
  • Corrected rounded corners on bottom bar
  • Toggle switches are now round
  • Removed padding fix for Wide Load (TVTropes now includes padding by default)
